meanings.definition: The quality or state of being recreant; cowardice or faithlessness.
meanings.sent1: His recreancies were evident when he abandoned his friends in need.
meanings.sent2: Her recreancies were revealed when she betrayed her team during the competition.
meanings.sent3: The villain's recreancies made him a feared character in the story.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's recreancies on the battlefield haunted him in his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's recreancies in keeping promises disappointed the students.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of recreancy; a cowardly or faithless act.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's recreancies in battle led to the downfall of his unit.
meanings.sent2: Her recreancies in the face of danger shocked everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's recreancies on stage made the audience laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The politician's recreancies in office cost him the trust of the voters.
meanings.sent5: The student's recreancies during the exam resulted in a failing grade.
